title: The Best Celebrity Haircuts of 2017
text: The Best Celebrity Haircuts of 2017 (So Far) X Hair Trends The Best Celebrity Haircuts of 2017 (So Far) The masterfully styled locks of famous men are what regular dudes use to let their barbers know what, exactly, they want their own heads of hair to look like (hence the need for a steady stream of goal-worthy celebrity haircuts). Clothes might make the man, but no amount of expert tailoring can save you (or Brad Pitt, for that matter) from a misguided, botched, or lazy haircut . Luckily for all of us, 2017 has already yielded a bounty of do-right hair gods—even if we're only two months into the new year. Each of these well-known—and well-groomed—gentlemen has boasted a haircut so stylish it nearly overshadowed his clothing choices (nearly—you're not going to sneak by us in a velour tracksuit). So consider this your follicle bible: Find your famous-dude spirit animal, bookmark his picture, and take it out next time you're seated in a barber 's chair. Swipe to see the photos Read More
